ygData.subject: Re: New Patch.
ygData.msgSnippet: Geez Bob, maybe beam a smile at him instead of auto-attack and maybe he will stick around  ... From:	Bob Stewart [mailto:bstewart@cisco.com] Sent:	Thursday,
ygData.messageBody:
Geez Bob,

maybe beam a smile at him instead of auto-attack and maybe he will stick
around

<g>



-----Original Message-----
From: Bob Stewart [mailto:bstewart@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 10, 1999 3:21 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] New Patch.

From: Bob Stewart <bstewart@...>

At 04:10 PM 6/10/99 -0400, J.M. Capozzi wrote:
>After 800 plus spells, Geoffrey admits to being
*temporarily* short on
>creativity.

Some people. Hrumph. What ever happened to good, round
numbers like 1000.

:-)}

So now that we have your attention, do you have any idea why
it's taken so
long to fix the bard animation so we aren't all the time
speeding around
strumming a pipe when we're supposed to be beating a drum?
That's a
pervasive silliness in the game environment. I'm rather
surprised playing
the pipe is correctly animated but the skill we probably use
most of our
time isn't.

Bob
